name: @redice44/canvas-lms-promise-pages
description: Promise driven driver for Cavnas LMS Pages's REST API.

scripts.dist: npm run build && mkdir -p ./dist && cp -r ./src/* ./dist/ && find ./dist -type f -name '*.ts' -delete && find ./dist -type f -name '*.js.map' -delete && find ./dist -type d -name '__tests__' -exec rm -r {} +

author: Matt Thomson <mthomson.lee@gmail.com>
